divs: Sighting DetailsYou folks should send someone here. There are unexplained lights in the sky every night. My wife and I have recently moved here from Georgia and we have never seen anything like this. These objects spew out lights of different colors continually, changing from red to green, blue, etc... I have counted as many as 15 of these objects in the sky at the same time out here.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Deming
There were no other sightings in Deming on or around August 27th 2010
Summary: Many objects in sky. All changing colors constantly.
